item.title: GDG Devfest in Zurich
item.description: Yesterday and today I attended the Google Developer Group (GDG) DevFest in ZÃ¼rich and I really enjoyed it! I have seen good presentations, met really nice people and I had great discussions. This afternoon I did a presentation about how to automate native Android apps using Calabash-Driver and how to leverage an existing Selenium Grid2 architecture to allow scaling and parallel testing. Here you find my slides of today’s presentation:
